education.info: Honours Degree in Computer Science and Information Systems

projects.title: Lotriet Logistics
projects.description: The Lotriet Logistics Website is a modern, responsive web application designed for a logistics company. Built with Angular and integrated with Three.js, the website offers a comprehensive overview of services such as fleet management, logistics and distribution, bulk load transport, and linehaul transport. The application features multilingual support using ngx-translate and is optimized for fast loading times and seamless user experience across various devices.

projects.title: Platinum Stars Nursery School
projects.description: This project is an improved website for a nursery school. It showcases the school's activities, events, and important information for parents and visitors. The site is built with Angular. Tailwind CSS, PrimeNG components, and PrimeIcons are used for styling and enhancing the UI. The project also utilizes Prettier for code formatting and ESLint for code linting.

projects.title: Ok Foods & Liquor Napier
projects.description: This Angular project is designed for OK Foods and Liquor Napier. It displays monthly specials, showcasing various products with promotional images managed using Azure Blob Storage. The application is user-friendly and aims to keep customers informed about the latest deals and discounts available at OK Foods and Liquor Napier.

contact.heading: Don't Be Shy - Reach Out
contact.detail: Feel free to get in touch with me and I will get back to you. I am always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions

about.heading: Behind The Scenes
about.description: I'm a dedicated software developer with 2 years and 7 months of experience in TypeScript, .NET Core, JavaScript, Angular, and database management. I enjoy crafting efficient and scalable software solutions and have a passion for learning new technologies. Outside of work, I love spending time outdoors, reading, participating in charitable activities, and playing games. I'm always eager to grow professionally and personally, embracing new challenges and opportunities.
